name: FactCurator
0:
”Alexa, open Fact Curator.”
”Alexa, play Fact Curator.”
”Alexa, start Fact Curator.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fact curator
des: Looking for an interesting skill to challenge kids' general knowledge? With questions suitable for kids, this skill is both entertaining and educating. Answer questions naturally, instead of picking one from a list of choices. It motivates kids to ask and compete to try to score higher points.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
